description: Distance of n-th primorial from previous prime.
links: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
example: Before 7th primorial 510481 is the largest prime. Its distance from 510510 is a(7)=29.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Mar 23 2001
extensions: More terms from _Jeppe Stig Nielsen_, Oct 31 2003
